title: The Amount received as scrutiny fee, hardship premium, and premium for additional FSI etc
clause_text: The Amount received as scrutiny fee, hardship premium, and premium for additional FSI etc. in TOD zone / circle shall be kept in separate head at Authority level and shall be utilizedfor development of metro project as per directives issued by Government from time to time.
section: Incentive for providing Public Parking in the area falling within the radius of 200 m. from the Metro / MRTS Station.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
